description: Drivers will have to pay to use public charging points on the Isle of Man in future, Manx Utilities says.
title: Isle of Man 'pay as you go' charging points rolled out
title_page: Isle of Man 'pay as you go' charging points rolled out - BBC News
maintext: Plans are in place for an additional two points in Castletown and four in Ramsey, which will see the island meet the EU target of one publically available charging point per 10 vehicles, and the Douglas Promenade refurbishment project will see another 30 put in place.
